text: Ke timila'i thaha chaina ki je–jati akasaharuma cha ra je–jati dharatima cha, allahala'i sabai thaha cha. Kunai pani tinajana manisaharuko gupta varta yasto humdaina jasama cautho allaha nahos ra na pamcajana manisaharuko huncha, jasama chaithaum tyo nahos. Na yasabhanda kamako na yasabhanda badhiko kintu tyo uniharuko sathama huncha, tiniharu jaham bha'epani, ani je–jati pani uniharule gareka holan, kayamatako dina usale uniharula'i unako karyabata avagata gara'ihalnecha. Niscaya nai allahala'i hareka kurako jnana cha
